desc: calculates the factorial of an integer
code: public int factorial (int n) { if (n == 1) { return 1; } return n * factorial (n - 1); }

desc: checks if a target number is present in the list of integers
code: public boolean contains ( List <Integer> numbers, Integer target ) { for ( Integer number: numbers ) { if  (number.equals ( target ) ) { return true; } } return false; }
